#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
string s[25];
int main() {
    int t,hor,ver,dig,dig1,flag=0;
    int n,k;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--) {
        cin>>n>>k;
        flag=0;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            cin>>s[i];
            
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            for(int j=0;j<n;j++){
                if(s[i][j]=='.'){
                    hor = 1;
                    ver=1;
                    dig =1;
                    dig1 =1;
                    int hc = i-1, vc;
                    while(hc>=0 && s[hc][j]=='X'){
                        hor++;
                        hc--;
                    }
                    hc = i+1;
                    while(hc<n && s[hc][j]=='X'){
                        hor++;
                        hc++;
                    }
                    vc = j-1;
                    while(vc>=0 && s[i][vc]=='X'){
                        ver++;
                        vc--;
                    }
                    vc= j+1;
                    while(vc<n && s[i][vc]=='X'){
                        ver++;
                        vc++;
                    }
                    hc = i-1;
                    vc = j-1;
                    while(vc>=0&&hc>=0 && s[hc][vc]=='X'){
                        dig++;
                        hc--;
                        vc--;
                    }
                    hc = i+1;
                    vc = j+1;
                    while(vc<n && hc<n && s[hc][vc]=='X'){
                        dig++;
                        hc++;
                        vc++;
                    }
                    hc = i+1;
                    vc = j-1;
                    while(hc < n && vc >=0 && s[hc][vc]=='X'){
                        dig1++;
                        hc++;
                        vc--;
                    }
                    hc = i-1;
                    vc = j+1;
                    while(hc >= 0 && vc<n && s[hc][vc]=='X'){
                        dig1++;
                        hc--;
                        vc++;
                    }
                    if(hor>=k || ver >=k || dig>=k || dig1>=k){
                        flag =1;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if(!flag)cout<<"NO"<<endl;
        else cout<<"YES"<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
